Resume Data.name: Sharief Mohammad
certifications: Advanced UX/UI Designing – Leapfrog The Design School
Design Thinking—A Primer – SWAYAM | IIT Madras
Digital Skills: User Experience – SWAYAM | IIT Roorkee

responsibilities: Designed end-to-end user experiences for InLynk, InClinic, and InFusion using Lean UX, translating business needs into intuitive, testable design solutions.
Utilized Gen AI tools (ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Grok) to automate user research synthesis, cutting insight generation time by 35%.
Built a scalable design system (50+ components/tokens) for InLynk across web and mobile, reducing design-dev handoff by 40% and iteration cycles by 30%.
Led structured design QA with developers and QA teams, integrated dynamic content via CMS, and reduced post-launch UI issues by 25%, boosting delivery speed.

Created user-friendly HMI interfaces for cars and bikes, aligning UX with automotive interaction standards and reducing driver distraction time by 20% through intuitive layout and touch-optimized controls.
Applied design thinking methods to develop personas, journey maps, and wireframes and solve UX problems with mixed-method research.
Built interactive prototypes, ran heuristic evaluations and accessibility testing, and incorporated iterative feedback from users and stakeholders.
Presented concepts to cross-functional teams, ensuring alignment with brand consistency by 40%
Delivered end-to-end UX/UI solutions for web and mobile apps, applying design thinking and lean UX frameworks tailored to each client’s goals and timelines.

Strengths: Proficiency in design thinking and user experience methodologies
Recommendations: Consider taking courses or gaining experience in Python programming, machine learning, and data handling to bridge the skill gap.
Tailor the resume and online profiles to highlight relevant skills and experience for AI/ML roles.
